Detailed Description

This is a class to make simple blocking two-way calls easier.

Note:
You are STRONGLY discouraged from using this from within message handlers, as you are heading straight for all the common re-entrancy problems.
See also:
Bundle::startRequest

void Mercury::BlockingReplyHandler::handleTimeout ( TimerHandle  handle,
void *  arg 
) [protected, virtual]

This method handles the max timer going off.

If this is called, we have not received the response in the required time.

Implements TimerHandler.
